data: For practice guidelines, refer to Decision Support Tool (DST): Indigestion - Heartburn, Upset Stomach (Aluminum-Magnesium Antacid)

Exceptions / Contraindications: 
 - Severely debilitated patients, patients with kidney failure, alkalosis or hypermagnesaemia
aluminum-magnesium hydroxide 40 mg-40 mg/mL oral liq
15 mL, PO, once, drug form: oral liq, first dose: NOW
15 mL, PO, once, drug form: oral liq, first dose: NOW
30 mL, PO, once, drug form: oral liq, first dose: NOW
Notify treating provider of ongoing therapy
